name: This website

Anonymous Message Form
no spam or personal info please!
about this website
originally inspired by simple strawpages my friends had made for themselves, this website is a quite obviously a passion project of mine. making all this took me a really long time so if you like what you're looking at, thanks!
if you'd like to suggest a feature, point out a bug, criticise my horrible code or just anonymously send me a message, click the button below!
credits
credits to:
apple inc. for creating the macOS finder which is shamelessly ripped off on the desktop version of this site, for the ios settings app which the mobile version is heavily inspired by and lastly for the San Francisco font and glyph library which is heavily utilised on this site
merqurio's Mac OS X Traffic Lights github project which i heavily borrowed from in order to recreate the macOS window controls
openAI for creating an AI chatbot, that while horrifically unethical, is absolutely incredible at quickly synthesisng very specific javascript code snippets. like 80% of the scripts on here were made / modified by it so thanks a lot for not forcing me to learn another programming language in order to finish this site
all the respective companies who's logos i used in the social media part of this website
my friends for making their own simple about me pages that ended up inspiring me to create this website
w3schools and MDN web docs for providing absolutely excellent documentation and guides for html, css and javascript
and lastly, stackoverflow for keeping up a wonderful and extremely useful archive of forum posts that helped me fix the issues i faced while coding this website.
website last updated on 15/01/2025
